messages.content: On 8 June, Highland voters can choose between a Labour government that stands up for the many, or the Tories who only look after a privileged few. While they give the super-rich tax breaks, working families are worse off. The SNP has simply passed on Tory austerity while it focuses on plans for a divisive second independence referendum that Scotland doesn’t want.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I'll oppose a divisive second independence referendum. Nicola Sturgeon should get back to the day job.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Lift the national minimum wage to £10 an hour
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Highlands deserve a pay rise. Labour's real living wage will deliver it.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect tax credits for those in work and benefits for those who can't
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I'll fight to ensure more for those who need it and that the big sure businesses and the super rich pay their share.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Seek more investment for Inverness Nairn Badenoch and Strathspey to create jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Highlands need an economy that works for us all.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Say No to a hard Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A hard Brexit will be bad for Scotland's economy. I'll oppose it and fight for a deal that works best for us all.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The SNP only cares about a divisive second independence referendum, whilst the Tories seek a hard Brexit that will do huge harm to our economy.

issues.brexitEurope: The SNP only cares about a divisive second independence referendum, whilst the Tories seek a hard Brexit that will do huge harm to our economy.
issues.economy: We need an economy that works for the many not the few. Everyone in work should have a decent job that pays a real living wage. A Labour Government will stop the Trade Union Bill, end Zero Hour contracts and make the well off and big business pay their fair share of tax.
issues.labourEmployment: We need an economy that works for the many not the few. Everyone in work should have a decent job that pays a real living wage.
issues.socialWelfare: I'll fight to ensure more for those who need it and that the big sure businesses and the super rich pay their share.

community.content: The Tories and the SNP have cut budgets for local services across the Highlands. I'll always stand up for our public services and fight to make sure local schools and hospitals receive the funding they need.

leaflet.personalStatement: I believe that together we’re stronger and I will oppose a second referendum and a hard Brexit.

endorsements.endorsement: “We’re backing Mike Robb as a strong local voice for this constituency. As a local businessman he knows only too well how the Tories and the SNP are cutting services and holding the economy back. Only Labour will build a Britain for the many, not the few, and oppose a second independence referendum.”

quotes.text: Scotland deserves a pay rise. That is why I support Labour's £10 an hour real living wage. People in this constituency deserve a fair day's pay for a fair day's work. We need an economy that works for the many not the few.

examples: The Highlands deserve a pay rise.
Labour's real living wage will deliver it.
Lift the national minimum wage to £10 an hour.
A vote for Labour on 8 June is a vote for a country run for the many, not the few.
The SNP only cares about a divisive second independence referendum, whilst the Tories seek a hard Brexit that will do huge harm to our economy.
This constituency needs a local champion who will oppose the damage a hard Brexit and IndyRef2 will do.
I'll fight to ensure more for those who need it and that the big sure businesses and the super rich pay their share.
Scotland deserves a pay rise. That is why I support Labour's £10 an hour real living wage.

The Tories and the SNP have cut budgets for local services across the Highlands. I'll always stand up for our public services and fight to make sure local schools and hospitals receive the funding they need.

We need an economy that works for the many not the few. Everyone in work should have a decent job that pays a real living wage. A Labour Government will stop the Trade Union Bill, end Zero Hour contracts and make the well off and big business pay their fair share of tax.
The SNP only cares about a divisive second independence referendum, whilst the Tories seek a hard Brexit that will do huge harm to our economy.

personalStories.story: As a local businessman he knows only too well how the Tories and the SNP are cutting services and holding the economy back.

examples: “We’re backing Mike Robb as a strong local voice for this constituency. As a local businessman he knows only too well how the Tories and the SNP are cutting services and holding the economy back. Only Labour will build a Britain for the many, not the few, and oppose a second independence referendum.” - David Stewart and Rhoda Grant
The Tories and the SNP have cut budgets for local services across the Highlands.
The SNP only cares about a divisive second independence referendum, whilst the Tories seek a hard Brexit that will do huge harm to our economy.
I'll oppose a divisive second independence referendum. Nicola Sturgeon should get back to the day job.
